title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of birds in millions, with a total of 9 data points.
Overall Number of birds in millions has increased over the Year
Number of birds in millions is roughly constant from 2000 to 2012, roughly decreasing from 2012 to 2015, and lastly gradually increasing from 2015 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Number of birds in millions about 20.6 was recorded at Year 2014, and 2017
Min Number of birds in millions about 14.3 was recorded at Year 2015
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of birds in millions, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2000 to 2008.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2008 to 2014.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2015.
